amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 115-783 to increase funding for the Quantum Information Sciences program within the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army account by $5 million to further advance quantum computing research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Soto.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
